result.title: time limit exceeding
result.content:
for problem http://codeforces.com/contest/920/problem/F [problem:920/f] explain what changes should I make to execute the code.

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int d(long int);
void sum(int,int);
long int i,j=0,k,n,y=0;
unsigned int z;
vector<int>v;
int main()
{
    long int n,m,l[30000],r[30000],t[30000];

    cin>>n>>m;

    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>z;
        v.push_back(z);
    }
   for(j=0;j<m;j++)
    {
        cin>>t[j]>>l[j]>>r[j];
    }
    for(j=0;j<m;j++)
    {
        if(t[j]==1)
        {
           while(l[j]<=r[j])
            {
                v[l[j]-1]=d(v[l[j]-1]);
               l[j]+=1;

            }
           /* for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                cout<<v[i]<<" ";
            }*/}
        else
        {

                sum(l[j],r[j]);
                cout<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
void sum(int a,int b)
{
    int s=0;
    for(i=a-1;i<b;i++)
    {
        s+=v[i];
    }
    cout<<s;
}
int d(long int a)
{
    int i,coun=0;
    for(i=a;i>=1;i--)
    {
        if(a%i==0)
        {
            coun++;
        }
    }
    return coun;
}
